about_the_game:
"MemoryMaze" is an exhilarating exploration in the puzzle-platformer genre, where players guide a ball through a wondrous world of puzzles and adventures.

  • Tight Platofrming


    Test your skills with carefully crafted platforming sections that demand precision and quick reflexes. Each maneuver is designed to offer a rewarding experience for those who enjoy a challenge.

  • Explore the Hidden World Around You


    Unlock the "Memories" mechanic to shift the environment into a different state, revealing hidden paths, secrets, and new challenges. Use this unique ability to explore alternate versions of each level and uncover the mysteries that lie beneath the surface.

  • Take Control


    Harness the power of the "Possess" mechanic to take command of special yellow orbs scattered throughout the levels. Use these orbs to manipulate the environment, solve intricate puzzles, and overcome challenging obstacles, giving you a creative edge in navigating the world around you.

  • Race to the Top


    Compete against the clock and other players in this thrilling Time Trial mode! Collect green cubes scattered throughout the level and race to finish in the shortest time possible. Your final score combines your completion time and the number of cubes collected, adding a strategic layer to each run. Climb the online leaderboards, refine your path, and challenge yourself to become the best!

  • A Scenic Route


    Immerse yourself in stunning environments filled with vibrant colors, enhanced by a soothing and atmospheric soundtrack that sets the perfect tone for a calming yet captivating experience.

  • Personalize


    Customize your experience with a variety of unique skins for your ball. Choose from 9 distinct designs available at launch, with more skins to be added in future updates. Make your journey through the maze truly your own!


"MemoryMaze" is more than just a game; it's an exploration of the inner world, memories, a challenge thrown to oneself, and an opportunity to take a break from the daily hustle and bustle by immersing oneself in a world of amazing sounds and puzzles. Only by overcoming all obstacles and exploring every corner can you achieve perfection in this game. Are you ready to challenge yourself?
